title: Population of Greece 2016 , by gender
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Gender, and Total population in each Gender on the y axis.
The Total population is highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The difference of Total population between the highest and lowest Gender is 5559538.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total population for 3 number of Genders.
Gender Total has the highest Total population and Males has the lowest Total population.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Gender, and Total population in each Gender on the y axis.
The Total population is highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The difference of Total population between the highest and lowest Gender is 5559538.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total population for 3 number of Genders.
The Total population is appeared to be the highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The highest value at Gender Total is 2.06x times more than the lowest value at Males.
The Gender Males has 1.5 times less Total population than average.
The Total population is 21567496.0 if we add up values of all Genders.
